Ingredients.4: 1 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined

Ingredients.9: 0.75 cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese, divided

Directions.1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook angel hair pasta in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, 4 to 5 minutes. Drain and set aside.

Directions.2: Set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler.

Directions.3: Heat 1/4 cup butter over medium heat in a large, deep skillet. Add garlic; cook and stir until fragrant. Add shrimp, white wine, and lemon juice; continue to cook and stir until shrimp is bright pink on the outside and the meat is opaque, about 5 minutes. Stir in red pepper flakes until well combined. Remove from heat and set aside.

Directions.4: Place remaining 1/4 cup butter, bread crumbs, 1/2 the Parmesan cheese, and parsley in a bowl. Stir until well combined. Set aside.

Directions.5: Place cooked pasta into shrimp scampi mixture; toss until fully coated in sauce. Add remaining Parmesan cheese and toss well. Top with bread crumb mixture.

Directions.6: Broil in the preheated oven until golden brown, 3 to 4 minutes. Serve immediately.
